BULLETIN NO. 148 
Facet Filtration Communication 
9 October 2023 
THIS BULLETIN IS ADDRESSED TO ALL JIG MEMBERS. 
FACET FILTRATION HAS RELEASED AN URGENT INDUSTRY COMMUNICATION, 
RECOMMENDING THAT THE USE OF CERTAIN FACET FUEL MONITORS BE 
DISCONTINUED WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT. 
We wish to inform all JIG Members who may not have received direct communication from the Facet 
Filtration Group that they have issued a notice on 7th October, advising users to discontinue using the Facet 
Fuel Monitors listed in the communication attached below. 
Periodic testing has returned ICP Copper test results that indicates that SAP is being identified downstream 
of new filter monitor elements in laboratory conditions. 
WE REMIND JIG MEMBERS THAT FILTER MONITORS WERE WITHDRAWN FROM THE STANDARDS ON 
1 JULY 2023. This Bulletin is simply to alert the JIG Community of the attached communication and to remind 
all parties operating to JIG Standards that Filter Monitors shall no longer be in use. 
We are still communicating with industry stakeholders and will be issuing a further bulletin about into-plane 
filtration in the near future. 
FACET COMMUNICATION: ATTACHED BELOW
